Documents/Programming/Projects/AuthorizedTasksInCocoa/AuthorizedTasks_Demo.h

00001 #include "BetterAuthorizationSampleLib.h"
00002 #include "CommandProcArguments.h"
00003 
00004 
00005 // ********************************
00006 // Constants for Each of your Tasks
00007 // ********************************
00008 
00009 // Descriptions of each task.
00010 
00011 // "GetVersion" gets a version number from the helper tool.
00012 // "GetUIDs" gets the important process UIDs (RUID and EUID) of the helper tool.
00013 // "OpenSomeLowNumberedPorts" opens some low-numbered ports on our behalf.
00014 // "SetAnyUserPrefs" sets some preferences for some bundle ID in /Library/Preferences.
00015 // "WriteDataToFile" writes data to a file that you may not have write access to.
00016 
00017 
00018 // Declare a "command proc" (function) for each task.  (These are defined in the Helper Tool.)
00019 
00020 OSStatus DoGetVersion(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00021 OSStatus DoGetUID(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00022 OSStatus DoOpenSomeLowNumberedPorts(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00023 OSStatus DoSetAnyUserPrefs(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00024 OSStatus DoWriteDataToFile(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00025 
00026 // Declare a "command name" for each task.
00027 
00028 #define kGetVersionCommand                                      "GetVersion"
00029 #define kGetUIDsCommand                                         "GetUIDs"
00030 #define kOpenSomeLowNumberedPortsCommand        "OpenSomeLowNumberedPorts"
00031 #define kSetAnyUserPrefsCommand                         "SetAnyUserPrefs"
00032 #define kWriteDataToFileCommand                         "WriteDataToFile"
00033 
00034 // Declare a "right name" for each task.
00035 
00036 // kGetVersionRightName                         The trivial GetVersion does not require authorization, so we don't define a right for it.
00037 #define kUIDRightName                           "com.yourCompany.AuthorizedTasksInCocoa.GetUIDs"
00038 #define kLowNumberedPortsRightName      "com.yourCompany.AuthorizedTasksInCocoa.OpenSomeLowNumberedPorts"
00039 #define kSetAnyUserPrefsRightName       "com.yourCompany.AuthorizedTasksInCocoa.SetAnyUserPrefs"
00040 #define kWriteDataToFileRightName       "com.yourCompany.AuthorizedTasksInCocoa.WriteDataToFile"
00041 
00042 
00043 // ***********************************************************
00044 // Optional Keys used to Pass Data to and from the Helper Tool
00045 // ***********************************************************
00046 
00047 /*
00048  These keys appear in the request and response dictionaries.
00049  You can re-use these in different tasks, or define your own as needed.
00050  These are defined without the "@" prefix so that they can be used in CFSTR()
00051  To use create NSStrings in Cocoa methods, add the "@" prefix.
00052  You may pass any ^serializable^ [1] CoreFoundation object
00053  (CFString, CFNumber, CFBoolean, CFDate, CFData, CFArray, and CFDictionary).
00054  If you wish to pass nonserializable objects you must archive them into a CFData.
00055  Wrapping nonserializable objects into a dictionary or array is not good enough.
00056  [1] http://developer.apple.com/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFPropertyLists/CFPropertyLists.html
00057 */ 
00058 #define kNumberPayload          "Version"           // CFNumber
00059 #define kNumberRUID                     "RUID"              // CFNumber
00060 #define kNumberEUID                     "EUID"              // CFNumber
00061 #define kDictionaryPayload      "Payload"                       // CFDictionary of prefs to be set
00062 #define kBundleIdentifier       "BundleIdentifier"  // name of .plist file in which to set prefs
00063 #define kData                           "Data"                          // CFData to write
00064 #define kPath                           "Path"                          // POSIX path to write the file to
